00053       public void OpenScope(Qualifier q, String name, bool checkName)
00054       {
00055          if (this.actualTable != null)
00056          {
00057             q.Add(this.actualTable);
00058             this.table[this.actualTable].OpenScope(q, name, checkName);
00059          }
00060          else
00061          {
00062             if (this.table.ContainsKey(name))
00063             {
00064                if (checkName)
00065                   throw new SymbolTableException("ERR: Scope already used: " + name);
00066 
00067                this.actualTable = name;
00068             }
00069             else
00070             {
00071                Console.WriteLine("Opening scope: " + name);
00072                q.Add(name);
00073                this.table[name] = new NamedSymbolTable(q);
00074                this.actualTable = name;
00075                
00076             }
00077 
00078          }
00079       }

00085                 {
00086                         OpenScope(q, name, true);

00092                 public void OpenScope()
00093                 {
00094                         if (this.actualTable != null)
00095                         {
00096                                 this.table[this.actualTable].OpenScope();
00097                         }
00098                         else
00099                         {
00100                                 Console.WriteLine("Opening scope: ~scope");
00101                                 this.actualTable = "~scope";
00102                                 this.table[this.actualTable] = new SymbolTable();
00103                                 this.table[this.actualTable].OpenScope();
00104                                 //this.table[this.actualTable].Class = this;
00105                         }
00106                 }

00113                 public void CloseScope()
00114                 {
00115                         if (this.actualTable != null)
00116                         {
00117                                 if (this.table[this.actualTable].Open)
00118                                 {
00119                                         this.table[this.actualTable].CloseScope();
00120                                         if (this.actualTable == "~scope" && !this.table[this.actualTable].Open)
00121                                         {
00122                                                 Console.WriteLine("Closing scope: " + this.actualTable);
00123                                                 this.actualTable = null;
00124                                         }
00125                                 }
00126                                 else
00127                                 {
00128                                         //Console.WriteLine("Closing scope: " + this.table[this.actualTable].Entry.FullQualifier);
00129                                         this.actualTable = null;
00130                                 }
00131                         }
00132                 }

00134                 public void Enter(String id, IdEntry entry)
00135                 {
00136                         if (this.actualTable != null)
00137                         {
00138                                 this.table[this.actualTable].Enter(id, entry);
00139                         }
00140                         else
00141                         {
00142                                 Console.WriteLine("Entering: " + id);
00143 
00144                                 entry.Level = this.CurrentLevel;
00145 
00146                                 if (this.fields.ContainsKey(id))
00147                                 {
00148                                         throw new SymbolTableException("ERR: Variable already declared for current scope: " + id);
00149                                 }
00150 
00151                                 this.fields.Add(id, entry);
00152                         }
00153                 }

00155                 public IdEntry Retrieve(String id)
00156                 {
00157                         IdEntry retrieved = null;
00158 
00159                         if (this.actualTable != null)
00160                         {
00161                                 retrieved = this.table[this.actualTable].Retrieve(id);
00162                         }
00163 
00164                         if (retrieved == null)
00165                         {
00166                                 if (this.fields.ContainsKey(id) && (this.personalInformation == null))
00167                                 {
00168                                         retrieved = this.fields[id];
00169                                 }
00170                         }
00171 
00172                         return retrieved;
00173                 }

00175                 public IdEntry RetrieveQualified(Qualifier qualifier)
00176                 {
00177                         if (qualifier.Count > 1 && this.table.ContainsKey(qualifier[0]))
00178                         {
00179                                 Qualifier n = new Qualifier(qualifier.GetRange(1, qualifier.Count - 1));
00180 
00181                                 return this.table[qualifier[0]].RetrieveQualified(n);
00182                         }
00183                         else if (qualifier.Count == 1 && this.fields.ContainsKey(qualifier[0]))
00184                         {
00185                                 return this.fields[qualifier[0]];
00186                         }
00187                         else if (qualifier.Count == 1 && this.table.ContainsKey(qualifier[0]))
00188                         {
00189                                 return this.table[qualifier[0]].Entry;
00190                         }
00191 
00192                         return null;
00193                 }
